item.title: NextPlat Corp 10-K
item.description: NextPlat Corp, which is in the Telephone Communications (No Radio Telephone) [4813] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 31, 2022 had 45766 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 831 instances stock - 629 instances 2021 - 602 instances may - 509 instances common - 371 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
